blogList.gridTitle: Metallica Lights Up Fortnite in Festival, BR & More!
blogList.author: The Fortnite Team
blogList.title: Metallica Lights Up Fortnite with a New Music Experience, Festival Season, and More!
blogList.content:
The bell tolls, but it brings good news‚Ä¶

Rock & Roll Hall of Fame inductees Metallica strike Fortnite in v30.10! This means an immersive music experience starting June 22 and a Metallica Season in Festival starting June 13 WITH v30.10. It also means a Battle Royale POI based on the M72 World Tour and a Rocket Racing track to take the corner!


Metallica: Fuel. Fire. Fury.


 
Experience Metallica‚Äôs music like never before in Metallica: Fuel. Fire. Fury. This journey through six of Metallica‚Äôs fan-favorite songs features gameplay that matches the intensity. The Master of Puppets awaits‚Ä¶ 
 
Dominated by the anticipation? Made by Magnopus, ‚ÄúMetallica: Fuel. Fire. Fury.‚Äù will have six different showtimes across two days: 


Saturday, June 22, 2024

  • 2 PM ET
  • 5 PM ET
  • 11 PM ET


Sunday, June 23, 2024

  • 10 AM ET
  • 2 PM ET
  • 5 PM ET

 
The experience will be in Fortnite‚Äôs Discover screen for thirty minutes each showtime, so even if you jump in later than the start, you can be part of the full show. Choose a time that works best with a party of up to four! Just catch one of the shows so you can finally sleep with both eyes closed.
 
We hear your fans screaming ‚Äî content creators in the Support-A-Creator program can share their ‚ÄúMetallica: Fuel. Fire. Fury‚Äù experience with the world. See the Content Creation for Metallica: Fuel. Fire. Fury. part of this blog post to learn more!


Take the Battle Stage in Fortnite Festival Season 4


 
James, Lars, Kirk, and Robert. These four are the Icons of Fortnite Festival Season 4! But they‚Äôre not just here to perform ‚Äî they‚Äôre here to battle. Season 4 brings a new experience that‚Äôll stick around after Season 4 ends: the PvP Battle Stage! 16 players enter, one will emerge victorious. (It‚Äôs a musical free-for-all!) Bring the heat to the Battle Stage, Jam Stage, or Main Stage to progress in the Season 4 Festival Pass!
 

 
The Festival Pass has a free reward track and Premium Reward Track upgrade. Both have in-game rewards to unlock as you keep rollin‚Äô through the Pass, including the Premium Reward Track‚Äôs James Hetfield, Kirk Hammett, and Robert Trujillo Outfits! Just by purchasing the Premium Reward Track, you‚Äôll unlock the Lars Ulrich Outfit. Fortnite Festival Season 4 goes live June 13 when v30.10 releases.
 

 
Roam outside Fortnite Festival? Adapt to the unknown in LEGO¬Æ experiences with James, Lars, Kirk, and Robert‚Äôs LEGO Styles!
 

 
When you‚Äôre back in the spotlight, complete Fortnite Festival‚Äôs Metallica Quests in a pursuit to unlock James's ESP Snakebyte Guitar and Robert's Warwick M72 Bass. These sequential Quests will be available until July 21, 2024 at 4 AM ET. 


Ride the Lightning in Battle Royale

Be a flash before enemies‚Äô eyes ‚Äî Ride the Lightning guitars will be on the Battle Royale Island! These instruments are as mobile as they are musical‚Ä¶ Use one to create a lightning arc in the sky that your squadmates can ride. On your descent, come crashing down to bring the beginning of an enemy‚Äôs end. Get this guitar from the ground or Chests!
 

 
Ride the Lightning isn‚Äôt the only way to go sky-high. In the middle of every match, the floating Metallica Loot Island will rift from a hole in the sky. It‚Äôs no dream or lie ‚Äî atop this island is a stage inspired by the M72 World Tour! Rock out to the holographic James, Lars, Kirk, and Robert to capture the POI and let loot loose (including Ride the Lightning).
 

 
Oh yeah, you can also earn an Emote and Loading Screen from Battle Royale‚Äôs Metallica Quests! These sequentially available Quests, plus the other marks of Metallica, will be in BR ‚Äòtil July 2, 2024, at 9 AM ET.


Ring the Bell! Compete in the Metallica Cup

Ride the lightning all the way to victory. The Squads Fill, Battle Royale Metallica Cup happens June 18 and gives players the opportunity to earn the foreboding Ringer Emote before it resounds in the Shop! Earn this Emote by being one of the top point-earning players in your region.
 

 
Competitors can play up to ten matches within their region‚Äôs three-hour time window, and the specific event timing for each region can be found in the ‚ÄúCompete‚Äù tab in-game. 
 
(Note: Once a player participates in a region in any competitive event during Battle Royale Chapter 5 Season 3, they will be locked to that region for any subsequent sessions of that event, as well as all sessions for future events in the Season.) 
 
Scoring will follow the format below:


Match Placement

Victory Royale: 62 points
2nd: 52 points
3rd: 45 points
4th: 40 points
5th: 35 points
6th: 30 points
7th: 28 points
8th: 26 points
9th: 24 points
10th: 22 points
11th: 20 points
12th: 18 points
13th: 16 points
14th: 14 points
15th: 12 points
16th: 10 points
17th: 8 points
18th: 6 points
19th: 4 points
20th: 2 points


Each Elimination

1 point
 

The Ringer Emote.

 
Among other requirements, competitors must have Two-Factor Authentication enabled and verified on their Epic account and be at Account Level 15 or above. (You can find your Account Level in Fortnite‚Äôs ‚ÄúCareer‚Äù tab.) Players with Cabined Accounts are not eligible to participate in the Metallica Cup. For full details and eligibility requirements, please see the Metallica Cup Official Rules.


Go Full Speed on a New Rocket Racing Track

You‚Äôve got the fuel, the fire, but it‚Äôs still not hot enough. Turn up the temperature on Rocket Racing‚Äôs new Thrash Mountain track! This volcanic track is a tribute to all things rock ‚Äî and not just the geology kind. You‚Äôve got instrumental monuments, a stretch of road like a fretboard, and Metallica‚Äôs ‚ÄúFuel‚Äù playing in the background.
 
This is a pretty hardcore track, but that doesn‚Äôt mean it‚Äôs hard. This is a Novice track you can unlock in ranked racing at Bronze I!
 

 
Return to the fire ‚Äî the Backfire Car Body is one of the rewards for Rocket Racing‚Äôs Metallica Quests. So are the Puppetmaster Backfire Decal and Chasing Light Wheels! Shred the path all the way to the finish line.
 

 
The Thrash Mountain track and sequential Metallica Quests will be in Rocket Racing ‚Äòtil August 16, 2024, at 9 AM ET. Turbo fiends, drift everywhere you can on Thrash Mountain!


Puppet Masters, Music, and More

 We‚Äôre not fading to black just yet! Metallica will also send thunderwaves across the Shop:


Make Way for the Puppet Masters


 
There‚Äôs a fire inside that can‚Äôt be quenched. Starting with v30.10 on June 13, the Puppet Master Outfits for Lars, James, Kirk, and Robert will be in the Shop! Get these Outfits in the Shop up until August 16, 2024.

  • Puppet Master James

  • Puppet Master Lars

  • Puppet Master Kirk

  • Puppet Master Robert

 
These Outfits give each member an otherworldly wardrobe ‚Äî including flame-emitting eyes and a blazing skull breastplate. Fitting for masters of miniature figures, each Outfit has a LEGO Style:

 


Enter More Songs

You can unlock the ‚ÄúOne‚Äù Jam Track in the Festival Pass‚Äô Premium Reward Track, but if one‚Äôs not enough, you can also get these Metallica tracks from the Shop:

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúEnter Sandman‚Äù

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúFuel‚Äù

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúMaster of Puppets‚Äù

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúRide the Lightning‚Äù

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúThe Unforgiven‚Äù

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúWherever I May Roam‚Äù

 
There‚Äôll be more Metallica Jam Tracks over the weeks too. They‚Äôll be in the Shop ‚Äòtil August 16, 2024!

 



Burn Rubber

Get your road crew together because the Metallica J√§ger 619 Bundle will be in the Shop until June 26, 2024:

  • J√§ger 619 Car Body (has 13 paint colors)

  • Circuit Pro J√§ger 619 Decal

  • Euphoria J√§ger 619 Decal

  • Kraken J√§ger 619 Decal

  • Storm Warning J√§ger 619 Decal

  • Stripes J√§ger 619 Decal

  • The Summit J√§ger 619 Decal

  • Puppetmaster J√§ger 619 Decal


Everything in this bundle is eligible for cross-game ownership with Rocket League!
 

The J√§ger 619 Car Body equipped with the Puppetmaster J√§ger 619 Decal and Lightning Ride Wheels. The Lightning Ride Wheels will be in the Shop until June 26!

 
If you already have the J√§ger 619 Car Body in Fortnite, you‚Äôll automatically receive the Puppetmaster Decal when it comes to the Shop, as well as ALL J√§ger Decals that come to the Shop in the future if they're not in your collection. This applies to all Car Bodies starting in v30.10. If any Decal for a Car Body you own enters the Shop, you‚Äôll receive that Decal automatically if you don't already have it.


Content Creation for Metallica: Fuel. Fire. Fury.

Content creators in the Support-A-Creator (SAC) program will be able to host VOD content from ‚ÄúMetallica: Fuel. Fire. Fury.‚Äù on YouTube and monetize it for seven days (June 22 at 2 PM ET to June 29 at 2 PM ET). No takedown notifications should occur during this time. 
 
More info:

  • In order to monetize your ‚ÄúMetallica: Fuel. Fire. Fury.‚Äù content, you need to link your YouTube and Support-A-Creator accounts.

  • IMPORTANT: When uploading the content to YouTube, be sure to upload it as Unlisted or Public. If you upload the video as Private, it's possible you could receive a monetization claim on your video.

  • For uploading the content on other platforms, refer to the channel‚Äôs platform policies for tips on how to avoid copyright strikes.


Although unlikely, if you do receive a claim on any SAC content, there may be a short delay in YouTube processing the release of the claim. During this time, please do not dispute the claim.
 
Not in SAC? Don‚Äôt worry, you can still share your highlights from the experience. However, you will not be able to monetize this content on YouTube.
 
Please note: For Twitch creators streaming ‚ÄúMetallica: Fuel. Fire. Fury.‚Äù, we cannot prevent your VODs or clips from getting flagged by third-party copyright detection systems. The general recommendation is to disable VODs/clips when streaming the experience. For more information, see Twitch‚Äôs DMCA & Copyright FAQs help page.

blogList.author: The Fortnite Team
blogList.title: Fortnite Festival Season 4: Prepare for Battle with Metallica!
blogList.content:
There‚Äôs a storm raging over Fortnite Festival! James Hetfield, Lars Ulrich, Kirk Hammett, and Robert Trujillo from Metallica are the Icons of Season 4. 

Season 4 starts June 13 with v30.10 and ends August 16, 2024, at 12 AM ET. During this time, seek and destroy your opponents on the new Battle Stage, shred to your favorite Metallica tracks on the Jam Stage and Main Stage, and unlock in-game rewards by tearing your way through the Season 4 Festival Pass. 

Crank it to 11 with the Premium Reward Track, which unlocks an extra layer of rewards. Take a seat behind Lars‚Äôs TAMA Kit with Zildjian cymbals or step onto the stage with James, Lars, Kirk, and Robert‚Äôs Outfits! 


Battle Stage: 16 Players Enter‚Ä¶ Only One Will Win

It‚Äôs time to prove yourself on the Fortnite Festival Battle Stage! Battle your opponents across a four-song setlist to be the last one standing when the curtain comes down and it all fades to black‚Ä¶ 

Each public Battle Stage match begins with up to 16 players, all competing to get the highest score on a randomly chosen song from Festival‚Äôs featured rotation. You‚Äôll play the same track as other players but get to choose your song part and difficulty as you riff your way to the highest score. Owned Jam Tracks cannot be selected, so no one player has an advantage. The four lowest-scoring players are eliminated at the end of each song until there‚Äôs a single victor! 



Don‚Äôt worry if you hear a tune you haven‚Äôt mastered yet. You can turn the tides of battle by launching attacks on your opponents to slow their scoring and break their streak! Prepare for your attack the same way you‚Äôd launch into Overdrive on the Main Stage ‚Äî play Overdrive Phases to build Overdrive and press the Attack button to throw your rivals off course while boosting your own score! The more Overdrive you hold, the longer your attack will be. 

Playing accurately, maintaining your streak, and attacking at the right times is key. We've set the Bass and Mic multipliers to 4x instead of 6x on the Battle Stage, so everyone‚Äôs on an even playing field! The skill rating system in public matches, based on rounds survived and players defeated, is factored into matchmaking so you don't face off against the #1 player in the world right off the bat.

If you play Battle Stage in a private match, compete against your party of up to four! We‚Äôll leave the setlist to you ‚Äî players in a private match can choose from their shared library of owned Jam Tracks and Festival‚Äôs featured rotation.

Find the Battle Stage in Discover next to ‚ÄúFestival Main Stage‚Äù and ‚ÄúFestival Jam Stage.‚Äù This experience will stick around beyond Season 4. On the Battle Stage, nothing else matters besides victory! (and having fun)


Rip Your Way Through the Festival Pass Tab

Ready to show the world how hard you‚Äôre willing to rock? Find the Festival Quests for this Season by entering the Lobby of a Fortnite Festival experience (‚ÄúMain Stage,‚Äù ‚ÄúJam Stage,‚Äù or ‚ÄúBattle Stage‚Äù) and heading to the Festival Pass in the top navigation!


Season 4 Festival Pass

The harder you rock, the heavier the rewards. Complete Festival Quests to earn Festival Points that‚Äôll help you progress in this Season‚Äôs Festival Pass. 

Free Reward Track

Restore your spirit after a tough show. The Slurp Blaster Guitar is built for the blues and waiting for you as the final reward in the free reward track. 



Once your blues are cured, get to practicing the free reward track‚Äôs three Jam Tracks:

  • Epic Games - ‚ÄúS.O.M.P‚Äù

  • Epic Games - ‚ÄúThe Night Porter (Winnage)‚Äù

  • Epic Games - ‚ÄúDreamer‚Äù 


Oh and by the way, all of your owned Jam Tracks can be equipped as Lobby Tracks starting in Fortnite v30.10! Get a good song going while the band assembles.



Songs are just one part of capturing an audience. Enthrall the crowd with thrashing Auras, including the Dark Flame Aura that‚Äôll have your fans feeling the heat!



Keep the crowd spinning figuratively ‚Äî and your Guitar literally ‚Äî with the Roundhouse Emote. There‚Äôs never a wrong time for a roundhouse.



Premium Reward Track 

Who says you need a backstage pass to get a behind-the-scenes look at Metallica? Purchase the Premium Reward Track upgrade for 1,800 V-Bucks and start unlocking a mountain of Metallica memorabilia!

Nothing beats stepping into the shoes of the legendary rock stars themselves. Purchasing the Premium Reward Track unlocks the Lars Ulrich Outfit immediately, while the Robert Trujillo, Kirk Hammett, and James Hetfield Outfits can be unlocked by progressing through the track. 



The show‚Äôs just getting started ‚Äî bring the sticks down on Lars's TAMA Kit. If you could never master the double kick and guitars are more your thing, then it‚Äôs time to shred that ‚ÄúEnter Sandman‚Äù solo on Kirk‚Äôs Gibson ‚ÄúGreeny‚Äù Les Paul! 



As for what music awaits you in the Premium Pass, it‚Äôs the one and only‚Ä¶ One! 

The One Jam Track.


Please note! üéµ The Season 4 Festival Pass‚Äô free reward track items and Premium Reward Track items are not exclusive to the Pass, and they may become purchasable in the Shop at a later date.


Wardrobe Master! Master! 

Look fit for battle on the Battle Stage. James, Lars, Kirk, and Robert are looking fiery with ‚ÄúPuppet Master‚Äù Outfits available in the Shop ‚Äòtil the bell tolls for Season 4.

Shred with the best with Puppet Master Kirk, be a warrior of the wastes as Puppet Master James, be on the beat as Puppet Master Robert, and bring percussive destruction with Puppet Master Lars. 



What‚Äôs more? These Jam Tracks from Metallica will also be in the Shop ‚Äòtil Season 4 ends:

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúEnter Sandman‚Äù

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúFuel‚Äù

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúMaster of Puppets‚Äù

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúRide the Lightning‚Äù

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúThe Unforgiven‚Äù

  • Metallica - ‚ÄúWherever I May Roam‚Äù


Keep an ear out for more Metallica tracks throughout Season 4!


Improvements and Fixes in Season 4


Lobby Jammin‚Äô

Your owned Jam Tracks can be equipped as Lobby Tracks! Try adding them to your Favorites, then hit Shuffle and enjoy a different groove each time you return to the Lobby.



Gameplay Improvements

We improved Fret Forgiveness (a.k.a. ‚Äúcoyote time‚Äù), increasing the time allowed between when you strum a note on Pro Lead/Pro Bass and when you need to press the correct fret input. Players who felt like they did the strum and fret inputs at the same time should now get credit when they do so, even if one comes slightly before the other.

Additionally:

  • We updated button bind visibility to be on by default for Pro song parts.

  • Your Strum bind will be visible on the HUD. (Only one Strum bind is visible, even though you can have two different binds. The other one is visible in your settings.)

  • You‚Äôll be able to deploy Overdrive during ‚Äúsong breaks,‚Äù where you have extended time between notes.



Festival Questing

  • Quests for the Main Stage, Jam Stage, and new Battle Stage will all share categories. Daily Quests have been updated to include all three experiences.

  • You‚Äôll be able to progress Jam Quests while Backstage when building your Main Stage setlist.

  • Many Main Stage Quests such as ‚ÄúHit Notes‚Äù and ‚ÄúDeploy Overdrive‚Äù will also be completable on the Battle Stage.



Jam Track Changes

We‚Äôve adjusted the following Jam Track song parts:

  • Doja Cat - Say So: Bass

    • Minor adjustments to improve consistency.
       

  • Epic Games - Streets Ignite: Lead

    • Minor adjustments to improve consistency.
       

  • Epic Games - Streets Ignite: Pro Lead

    • Fixed misplaced hammer-on and pull-off notes.
       

  • Kelly Clarkson - Stronger (What Doesn‚Äôt Kill You): Pro Lead

    • Fixed misplaced hammer-on and pull-off notes.
       

  • Metallica - Fuel: Pro Lead

    • Removed a couple notes in a repeating riff for consistency.
       

  • Muse - Hysteria: Lead

    • Adjusted a measure in the solo.
       

  • Muse - Hysteria: Pro Lead

    • Adjusted to be more consistent with Pro Bass.
       

  • Panic! At The Disco - High Hopes: Pro Bass

    • Fixed certain hammer-ons that didn‚Äôt function as intended, and made minor adjustments.
       

  • Rob Base & DJ EZ Rock - It Takes Two: Drums

    • Added a missing kick.


Fortnite Festival Season 4 Content Creation

Wanting to make Season 4 content for YouTube? This Season, content creators in the Support-A-Creator (SAC) program will be able to host VOD content on YouTube featuring the below selection of Jam Tracks (and their loops) and monetize it. Your content can also feature these Jam Tracks as Lobby Tracks!

Jam Track selection:

  • Metallica - Enter Sandman

  • Metallica - One

  • Metallica - Ride The Lightning

  • Metallica - The Unforgiven

  • Metallica - Wherever I May Roam
     

The selection of Jam Tracks will change each week on Thursdays at 10 AM ET, so keep checking back to see what‚Äôs safe to feature in your content! No takedown notifications should occur during the Jam Track selection‚Äôs time window.

More info:

  • In order to monetize your content featuring the Jam Tracks, you need to link your YouTube and Support-A-Creator accounts.

  • IMPORTANT: When uploading the content to YouTube, be sure to upload it as Unlisted or Public. If you upload the video as Private, it's possible you could receive a monetization claim on your video.

  • For uploading the content on other platforms, refer to the channel‚Äôs platform policies for tips on how to avoid copyright strikes.


Although unlikely, if you do receive a claim on any SAC content, there may be a short delay in YouTube processing the release of the claim. During this time, please do not dispute the claim.

Not in SAC? Don‚Äôt worry, you can still share your Fortnite Festival experiences on YouTube during Season 4 featuring the selected Jam Tracks. However, you will not be able to monetize this content on YouTube.



Please note! üéµ For Twitch creators streaming content featuring the selected Jam Tracks, we cannot prevent your VODs or clips from getting flagged by third-party copyright detection systems. The general recommendation is to disable VODs/clips when streaming Fortnite Festival. For more information, see Twitch‚Äôs DMCA & Copyright FAQs help page.

blogList.gridTitle: Nick Eh 30 Joins the Icon Series!
blogList.author: The Fortnite Team
blogList.title: Make Way for the Friendly King: Nick Eh 30 Joins the Fortnite Icon Series!
blogList.content:
Ehmazing news! Prepare the W key because fan-favorite content creator Nick Eh 30 joins the Fortnite Icon Series. (The humble king finally gets the red carpet due him!) To celebrate this friendly streaming sovereign, items from the new Nick Eh 30 Set will be entering the Shop on June 15, 2024, at 8 PM ET ‚Äî including the Nick Eh 30 Outfit, Eh Crown Pickaxe, and Never Back Down Back Bling. (never what?)

Never give up! Compete in the Nick Eh 30 Icon Cup on June 12 for a chance to unlock these three items early.


For the Meme, the Dream, the Stream, and the Eh Team!

The meme‚Äôs just a dream a little bit longer: the Nick Eh 30 Outfit is almost here! Toggle Nick‚Äôs glasses on or off, and a helmet. (Safety first!) Get a little more sophisticated with The King alt Style, which sparks with electricity and features a deceptively sinister crown. It‚Äôs no Victory Crown, but‚Ä¶ Eh. 

Nick Eh 30‚Äôs King Style.


Every king should have a scepter, and we‚Äôve got just the thing: the Eh Crown Pickaxe! And if anyone questions who‚Äôs in charge, kindly remind them who‚Äôs boss with the You Think You‚Äôre The King? Emote. 

The dream, the stream, the Eh Team, now it‚Äôs time for the Eh Theme. Show your opponents you‚Äôll never back down by putting the Eh Theme Wrap on your gear! Eh Theme lights up with electricity whenever you fire your weapon.



There are certain words that any Nick Eh 30 fan lives by. Take them with you across Fortnite with the Never Back Down Back Bling (included with the Outfit), which displays a different motivational message depending on your Health count!



Speaking of motivation, get a blast of uplifting rhythm with the Never Back Down Jam Track which doubles as a Lobby Track!



Forget a horse and carriage, real kings drive supercars. Rev like a royal with the Nick Eh 30 Decal for the Cyclone Car Body! You can pick up the Decal and Cyclone as part of the Nick Eh 30 Cyclone Bundle, which also includes Cyclone‚Äôs regular Decals:

  • Bat Boy

  • Flames

  • L-ITA 99

  • Sliver

  • Stripes

  • Whiteout


If you already have the Cyclone Car Body in Fortnite, you‚Äôll automatically receive the Nick Eh 30 Decal when it comes to the Shop, as well as ALL Cyclone Decals that come to the Shop in the future if they're not in your collection. This applies to all Car Bodies starting in v30.10. If any Decal for a Car Body you own enters the Shop, you‚Äôll receive that Decal automatically if you don't already have it.

The Cyclone Car Body with the Nick Eh 30 Decal equipped.


Practice Good Sportsmanship with the Nick Eh 30 Icon Cup!

Wish your fellow competitors good luck in the Nick Eh 30 Icon Cup, a Battle Royale Duos tournament happening June 12! Fight for your place as one of the top point-earning players in your region to unlock the Nick Eh 30 Outfit, Never Back Down Back Bling, and Eh Crown Pickaxe before they hit the Shop.



Duos who get at least 30 eliminations in the tournament will also earn the You Think You‚Äôre The King? Emote before it hits the Shop! And all players who get at least eight points will unlock the King Eh 30 Spray.



Competitors can play up to ten matches within their region‚Äôs three-hour time window, and the specific event timing for each region can be found in the ‚ÄúCompete‚Äù tab in-game. (Remember: Once a player participates in a region in any competitive event during Chapter 5 Season 3, they will be locked to that region for any subsequent session for that event, and all sessions for future events in the Season.) 

Scoring will follow the format below:


Match Placement

Victory Royale: 65 points
2nd: 56 points
3rd: 52 points
4th: 48 points
5th: 44 points
6th: 40 points
7th: 38 points
8th: 36 points
9th: 34 points
10th: 32 points
11th: 30 points
12th: 28 points
13th: 26 points
14th: 24 points
15th: 22 points
16th: 20 points
17th: 18 points
18th: 16 points
19th: 14 points
20th: 12 points
21st: 10 points
22nd: 8 points
23rd: 6 points
24th: 4 points
25th: 2 points


Each Elimination

1 point

Among other requirements, players must have Two-Factor Authentication enabled and verified on their Epic account, be at Account Level 15 or above (you can find your Account Level in Fortnite‚Äôs ‚ÄúCareer‚Äù tab), and be at Bronze rank or above in Ranked Battle Royale to participate. Players with Cabined Accounts are not eligible to take part in this tournament. 

For full details and eligibility requirements, please see the Nick Eh 30 Icon Cup Official Rules.
 


If you‚Äôve read to the end, you dropped this üëë

blogList.gridTitle: LEGO Fortnite v30.10 Adds Cozy Mode and Expert Mode!
blogList.author: The Fortnite Team
blogList.title: LEGO¬Æ Fortnite v30.10 Adds Cozy Mode and Expert Mode!
blogList.content:
LEGO¬Æ Fortnite fans,

Maybe you like combat, but want it to be a little easier so you can build, farm, AND feel mighty. That‚Äôs where the new Cozy mode comes in!



Perhaps for you, Survival mode was just the start. Do you have what it takes to face fiercer foes? Think you can up your game against regular enemies? And above all, are you willing to take on these challenges with the risk of permanent elimination? Test just how unbreakable you are in LEGO Fortnite‚Äôs new Expert mode!

Play Cozy and Expert when v30.10 arrives June 13.


Get Comfy in Cozy Mode

Whether you‚Äôre a beginner survivor or a builder who likes a little bit of thrill, Cozy mode‚Äôs up your alley! Create a world and get greeted by Slumber, a friendly face who‚Äôll guide you through your journey step-by-step. 


Cozy Mode Default Settings

Cozy mode is a nice mix of Survival and Sandbox mode. If that sounds like your thing, choose Cozy mode when creating a new world! These are the default settings if you choose Cozy mode. (They can all be changed!)

  • Enemies - On

  • Enemy Difficulty (new setting!) - Easy

  • Storm-Wild Enemies (new setting!) - Off

  • Hunger - Off

  • Temperature - Off

  • Stamina - Off

  • Player Elimination - Respawn

  • Drop Inventory Upon Elimination - Off

  • Friendly Creatures - On

  • Friendly Damage - Off

  • Villagers - On

  • Power System - Off

  • Village Animals Removed On Elimination - Off


Survive a Wild World in Expert Mode


Storm-Wild Enemies

‚ÄòFraid of Wild Wolves? Well now there are even wilder wolves.

In Expert mode, creatures infected by a ‚Äústorm‚Äù roam with creatures who haven‚Äôt been infected. (Where did this storm come from...) These Storm-Wild enemies deal more damage, have more Health, and move faster than regular enemies. If you're not prepared to face them, running away won't be easy...



All Storm-Wild enemies:

  • Storm-Wild Blaster
  • Storm-Wild Bone Wolf
  • Storm-Wild Brute
  • Storm-Wild Frost Brute
  • Storm-Wild Frost Roller
  • Storm-Wild Frost Scorpion
  • Storm-Wild Frost Wolf
  • Storm-Wild Hermit Crab
  • Storm-Wild Sand Brute
  • Storm-Wild Sand Roller
  • Storm-Wild Sand Scorpion
  • Storm-Wild Sand Spider
  • Storm-Wild Sand Wolf
  • Storm-Wild Scorpion
  • Storm-Wild Skeleton
  • Storm-Wild Scoundrels
  • Storm-Wild Spider
  • Storm-Wild Stone Roller
  • Storm-Wild Wild Wolf



Stronger Enemies

Regular enemies will be stronger in Expert mode than in other modes, even if they aren‚Äôt Storm-Wild! Better get those Recurve Crossbows and Longswords ready.



Perma-limination

So you‚Äôre still not scared? That‚Äôs good‚Ä¶

We should warn you: losing all your hearts in a world where Expert mode is on will make you permanently eliminated from that world. Got involved in a bad situation? If you have a Totem of Return equipped when you lose all your hearts, you‚Äôll revive in your bed with your backpack. The totem will destroy itself though ‚Äî a small cost for escaping permanent elimination!

Unlock the recipe for the Totem of Return by adding a Storm Core to your inventory. Get Storm Cores from Storm-Wild enemies!


The Totem of the Immortal will also be in Expert mode. Got eliminated with no totem in tow? On the bright side, you won‚Äôt be eliminated from all of LEGO Fortnite‚Ä¶ you can still hop into non-Expert worlds or make a new Expert world! So what happens to the old one? Key holders will still have a shot at survival unless you delete it.



Trophies for Your Bravery

Mark your survival skills with trophies in your world! 



Here are the symbols of courage you can earn in Expert mode:

  • Grasslands Trophy: Unlock by defeating a Storm-Wild Brute in the Grasslands, then interacting with a Level 10 Grasslands Village.

  • Dry Valley Trophy: Unlock by defeating a Storm-Wild Sand Brute, then interacting with a Level 10 Dry Valley Village.

  • Frostlands Trophy: Unlock by defeating a Storm-Wild Frost Brute, then interacting with a Level 10 Frostlands Village.


If you earn these trophies, you‚Äôve truly earned them üèÜ



Expert Mode Default Settings

Choose Expert mode when creating a new world! When creating a world, these are the default settings if you select Expert:

  • Enemies - On (cannot be changed!)

  • Enemy Difficulty (new setting!) - Hard (cannot be changed!)

  • Storm-Wild Enemies (new setting!) - On (cannot be changed!)

  • Hunger - On (cannot be changed!)

  • Temperature - On (cannot be changed!)

  • Stamina - On (cannot be changed!)

  • Player Elimination - Permanent (cannot be changed!)

  • Drop Inventory Upon Elimination - On (cannot be changed!)

  • Friendly Creatures - On (cannot be changed‚Ä¶ we‚Äôre throwing you a bone)

  • Friendly Damage - Off (this can be changed if you wanna go the extra mile)

  • Villagers - On (cannot be changed‚Ä¶ you‚Äôll need these buddies to help you out!)

  • Power System - On (cannot be changed‚Ä¶ you‚Äôll have to put in the work!)

  • Village Animals Removed On Elimination - On (cannot be changed‚Ä¶ keep ‚Äòem safe!)


Major Improvements, Adjustments, and Bug Fixes


Low Memory vs. Too Many Constructs Nearby

Before v30.10, you may have seen a ‚Äúhigh complexity‚Äù warning in your world, limiting your ability to build. v30.10 will clarify whether this is because of low memory or too many constructs nearby.

If you get a low memory or too many constructs nearby notification, here‚Äôs how you can try continuing normal play:

  • Low Memory: Try reducing overall constructs, the number of unique constructs, or items and creatures. Moving away from dense areas or exiting and re-entering the world can help too. (Note: the amount of memory available depends on the platform you‚Äôre playing on.)

  • Too Many Constructs Nearby: Try spreading out constructs over larger areas. Also try using larger Building Parts rather than many smaller ones to achieve a similar result. Building in a different location or removing constructs you no longer want can also help.



More Things

  • Villagers in the Rebel Village will no longer count towards the world Villager cap.

  • The world Villager count in the Village Hub will display the correct number of Villagers.

  • Skeletons will be less likely to spawn in Villages.

  • Lava Caves on Star Wars Island will have Rubies!

  • Animals will do a better job avoiding Campfires.

  • Wolves learned how to swim!  


LEGO Styles? We Got ‚ÄòEm!



Speaking of difficulty, choosing your perfect LEGO look for every occasion isn‚Äôt always easy. That‚Äôs why v30.10 adds even more LEGO Styles for your favorite Outfits! If you already own these Outfits, the LEGO Styles will automatically be in your Locker:

  • Agente Colorado
  • Airheart
  • Amazona Colorada
  • Backbone
  • Beach Brutus
  • Big Chuggus
  • Black Panther
  • Blitz (Team Fortnite)
  • Blizzard Bomber
  • Blockade Runner
  • Boardwalk Ruby
  • Brite Blaster
  • Brite Gunner

  • Cameo vs Chic
